sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import resumeFile from "../documents/resume.pdf"; const AboutUs = ({ classicHeader, darkTheme }) => { return (
{/* Heading */}

About Me

Bio

{/* Heading end*/}
{/* About me content start */}

Chase Agee

Software Engineer

Before taking the plunge into my career change into software engineering, I was a life-long cook and baker. Most recently I founded and operated a bakery in the Bay Area for 5{'\u00bd'} years. During that experience I came to realize I wanted something else out of life, and that's when I decided to pursue a career in software engineering.

I pride myself on my ability to learn quickly, adapt to ever-changing variables, and to work well with others while maintaining a positive work environment. I have a deep-rooted passion for finding the most efficient and effective solutions to problems. I have a strong, determined work ethic instilled by my parents and countless hours in professional kitchens. I am always looking for ways to improve my skills and knowledge.

{/* About me content end */} {/* about me personal detials start */}
    {/*
  • Name:Chase Agee
    • */}
  • Email: chase.agee@gmail.com
  • Phone:+1 (907) 317 5237
  • Location:Oakland, California
Download CV
{/* about me personal details end */}
{/* projects rewards counting start

10+

Years Experiance

250+

Happy Clients

650+

Projects Done

38

Get Awards

projects rewards counting end */}
); }; export default AboutUs;
